settings.introSubTitle: A Lightweight Survey Tool for Online Studies
settings.introText: A Lightweight Survey Tool for Online Studies is only for the Frankfurt University of Applied Sciences students who wants to give the student satisfactory report for their University Survey. This survey is part of the research and for scientific purposes only.Participation in the survey is voluntary to view and print the full informed consent. The survey takes ca. 5 minutes. If you have questions or comments, feel free to send an email.
settings.instructionsText: The technology for online survey research is young and evolving. Until recently, creating and conducting an online survey was a time-consuming task requiring familiarity with web authoring programs, HTML code, and scripting programs. Yet many researchers in different disciplines may be unaware of the advantages and disadvantages associated with conducting survey research online. To individuals in distant locations, the ability to reach difficult to contact participants, and the convenience of having automated data collection, which reduces researcher time and effort. In addition, it reviews the current state of available web survey software packages and services, various features of these software packages and services, and their advantages and limitations. To facilitate these goals, which are both methodological and applied, the author draws on published research dealing with online survey methods and his experience conducting online surveys.
settings.byebye:
Your data has been saved.
Students receiving trial students will receive an e-mail when and where they receive the signed form by February 29 2020.
settings.studentsSentence: Students of the Frankfurt Frankfurt University of Applied Sciences who receive credit points will receive a separate email until February 29 2020 when and where they can get their signed confirmation of study participation.
settings.mciStudentText: I am student of the Frankfurt Frankfurt University of Applied Sciences and want to receive 1.0 credit points.
settings.lotterySentence: Students of the Frankfurt Frankfurt University of Applied Sciences who want to receive 1.0 credit points for their study course please enter name and e-mail:
settings.lotteryText: I agree that this data will be stored until the end of this survey.

questionnaire.name: SCM Questionnaire
questionnaire.description: As viewed by university, how . . . is this person:
questionnaire.item: competent
confident
independent
competitive
intelligent
tolerant
warm
good-natured
sincere

questionnaire.name: WEAR Scale
questionnaire.description: Please rate the extent to which you agree with the following statements:
questionnaire.item: I like what this gesture communicates about its performer
I could imagine aspiring to be like the performer of such a gesture
This gesture is consistent with my self-image
This gesture would enhance the performerâ€™s image
The performer of this gesture would get a positive reaction from others
I like how this gesture shows membership to a certain social group
This gesture seems to be useful and easy to perform
This gesture could help people
This gesture could allow its performer to take advantage of people
Use of this gesture raises privacy issues
The performer of this gesture could be considered rude
Performing this gesture could be considered inappropriate
People would not be offended by the performance of this gesture
This gesture would be distracting when driving

questionnaire.name: My Questions
questionnaire.description: Please rate the extent to which you agree with the following statements:
questionnaire.item: Performing this gesture is generally socially accepted
Performing this gesture using a smartphone is socially accepted
I would perform this gesture in this context
I can imagine to be that person in that situation
Performing this gesture in this context is socially accepted

questionnaire.name: My Questions
questionnaire.item: Is this person rather a male or a female?
Is such a gesture rather performed by a male or a female?

questionnaire.name: Additional Questions
questionnaire.description: Finally, please provide feedback on the following questions:
questionnaire.item: I was able to imagine the person performing the gestures
The visualization was not always clear to me
How could the visualizations be improved?
What problems did you have while assessing the social acceptability?
What difficulties did you have in assigning the situation?

condition.name: Student-Content-1
condition.condition-description: Scene description: Which activities in the classroom do you enjoy the most?

condition.name: University-Content-2
condition.condition-description: Scene description: How effectively is your university course taught?

condition.name: Student-Content-3
condition.condition-description: Scene description: Do you have supportive classmates?

condition.name: University-Content-4
condition.condition-description: Scene description: How effectively are other courses taught at the university?

condition.name: Student-Content-5
condition.condition-description: Scene description: Do you think that the school provides you with adequate sports facilities?

condition.name: University-Content-6
condition.condition-description: Scene description: How well do the classrooms at this university meet the learning needs of students?

condition.name: Student-Content-7
condition.condition-description: Scene description: How much time do you spend every day on homework?

condition.name: University-Content-8
condition.condition-description: Scene description: How easy is it to obtain resources from the university library system?

condition.name: Student-Content-9
condition.condition-description: Scene description: Does your teacher encourage you to perform better?

condition.name: University-Content-10
condition.condition-description: Scene description: Are you satisfied with the teaching staff and their teaching methods?

condition.name: Student-Content-11
condition.condition-description: Scene description: How easy it is to get/access the resources from the school library?

condition.name: University-Content-12
condition.condition-description: Scene description: Was your Professor concerned that students were learning the material?

condition.name: Student-Content-13
condition.condition-description: Scene description: How supportive were the faculty members?

condition.name: University-Content-14
condition.condition-description: Scene description: Was your Professor concerned that students were learning the material?

condition.name: Student-Content-15
condition.condition-description: Scene description: Do you have supportive classmates?

condition.name: University-Content-16
condition.condition-description: Scene description: How about your overall experience with this university?

condition.name: Student-Content-17
condition.condition-description: Scene description: After each test, does your teacher help you in understanding ways to improve your grades?

condition.name: University-Content-18
condition.condition-description: Scene description: How likely are you considering continuing in this college next year?

condition.name: Student-Content-19
condition.condition-description: Scene description: Do you feel it is easier to register for different courses within the college?

condition.name: University-Content-20
condition.condition-description: Scene description: Finally is this University worth for your carrier Goal?

condition.name: finalcondition
condition.condition-description: We would be happy about your feedback
